description: This veggie packed spiced shepherd's pie works perfectly with sweet potato mash.
keywords: Vegetable pie & tart,Seafood free,Wheat free,Sweet potato,Egg free,Tomato,Sesame free
name: Indian Spiced Veggie Cottage Pie with Sweet Potato Mash Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium onions, peeled and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, non-stick pan on medium heat and cook the onions, celery and carrots for 6-8 minutes, stirring. Stir in the garlic, cumin and coriander and lentils and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir in the chopped tomatoes and stock, partially cover with the lid and simmer for 20-25 minutes until reduced.
Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Cook the sweet potatoes in a large pot of boiling water for 10-12 minutes, until tender. Drain well, mash and stir in the creme fraiche.
Pour the vegetable mix into an ovenproof dish, smooth the mash on top and bake for 30 minutes, until golden and bubbling.
